language.phrase: Username Is Too Short (less Than 4 Characters Long).
Sorry, This Username Is Already Taken
We are sorry, selected username does not exist in our database
Email address and Username combination is not valid
Leave it empty unless changing the password.
Password must contain at least one lower case letter, one upper case letter and one digit.
Your password did not match the confirmed password!
Password must be at least 6 characters long.
Entered Email Address Is Already In Use.
Entered Email Address Is Not Valid.
Entered Email Address Does Not Exist.
Login and/or password did not match to the database.
You need to verify your email address.
Please enter valid username and password
Are you sure you want to delete this record?
Sorry don't have administrative privileges to access this page.

The page you requested cannot be found. It seems the page you were trying to reach either doesn't exist or has been moved. We are sorry for the inconvenience. Please check the spelling of the URL, or return to our home page and try again
Changes made here will affect the settings of Digital Download Pro.
The name of your web site, which is displayed in various locations across your site.
This is your website slogan which will appear near your website heading
Insert full URL WITHOUT any trailing slash (e.g. http://www.yourdomain.com)
Leave it empty unless you installed DDP in other than root directory of your domain.
This is the main email notices will be sent to. It is also used as the from \email\ when emailing other automatic emails
If site is inactive it will display Maintenance mode message. To access your site go to admin panel and login as admin. Now only you'll be able to browse your site
Select the time when the site should be back online
Enter a message that will be displayed to your visitors, once the site is in offline mode.
Illegal file type. Only jpg and png file types allowed.
If no logo exists, Company Name will be used instead.
Locales are used for displaying dates in your own language format.
If your server supports Apache mod_rewrite, select Yes
Default number of items used for pagination
If Yes users will need to confirm their email address and go through activation process.
If Yes, once registration process is completed users will be able to login. If No Admin will need to manually activate each account.
Receive notification upon each new user registration.
Limit number of users that are allowed to register 0 = Unlimited
Enter your currency such as CAD, USD, EUR
Enter your currency symbol such as $, €, £

This is absolute path to your files directory. For security reasons this fodder should be in non-accessible web directory. Eg: /home/yourusername/filedirectory/. To find out your rooth directory go to System Information page and look up under DDP Info tab
If Yes visitors will be able to download FREE products, without being logged in.
Number of most recent product shown on home page.
Number of most popular product shown in sidebar.
Whether or not to display home page content.
Whether or not to display slider on homepage.
Default Layout on home page Grid or List
Default thumbnail Width, in px used for resizing images.
Default thumbnail Height, in px used for resizing images.
Use PHP Mailer or SMTP protocol for sending emails
If yes the system will apply mandatory taxes on checkout based on user country.
Add your company address, business info etc...
Invoice note displayed at footer section.
Choose Yes if your server requires SSL connection
Mail server port ( Can be 25, 26. 456 for GMAIL. 587 for Yahoo ). Ask your host if uncertain.
Ask your hosting company for sandmail path if unsure. Usually: /usr/sbin/sendmail -t -i
Paste your code Google Analytics code here. To sign up for Google Analytics, visit http://www.google.com/analytics
Meta keywords are used to describe your website. These are used by some search engines to categorise your website.
A meta description is a brief summary of the current page. It may be used by search engines when they display search results containing your website.
Here you can update your users profile.
Administrator has full rights. User is just registered user.
User Notes - For internal use only
Here you can add new user.
Send welcome email to this user.
Here you can manage your users.You can email each user by clicking on username. You can also activate each usser account by clicking on [ICON] icon.
Are you sure you want to activate this user account?
Email notification will be sent as well
User have been successfully activated and email has been sent.
There was an error while sending email.
You cannot delete main Administrator account!
You don't have any users yet...
Here you can manage your list of available gateways.
Here you can update your gateway settings.
When in live mode all transactions will be processed in real time
Only active gateways will be available for payment methods.
You are missing all gateways. You need to reinstall them manually
Here you can perform site maintenance, such as deleting inactive and banned users. Be careful what you doing, these actions can not be undone.

This will delete all users (not administrators), who have not logged in to the site within a certain time period. It will not delete users pending verification process. You specify the days spent inactive
This will delete all [BANNED] banned user(s).

Recently viewed items are stored in database based on user session. Once user leaves your store without buying anything, these items still remain. You should periodically delete them to improve your database performance.
All recently viewed items deleted successfully.
Here you can create site map in xml format, that you can submit to your search engine for better ranking. We recommend you regularly update your sitemap.
There was an error creating sitemap.xml. Make sure filename [FILENAME] exists and is writable!

Make sure your database is backed up frequently. Click on Create backup to manually backup your database. The backups are stored in the [/admin/backups/] folder and can be downloaded from the list below. Your most recent backup is highlighted. Make sure you download your most recent backup, and delete the rest.
Are you sure you want to restore databse?

The information displayed below is collected from a variety of locations, and summarized here so that you may be able to conveniently find some of the information required when trying to diagnose a problem or request help with your DDP installation.

To add French Language, make a copy of /lang/en/ folder into /lang/fr/. Now you can start translating language phrases usin Language Manager built in editor, or you can open xml files directly into your text editor, and modify from there. Just make sure that xml files are saved in utf-8 formatn without BOM.
Here you can update your existing language phrases.
Selected language file does not exist
Drag and drop items to change their positions on the tree. Click on a menu name to access edit options. Click on icon to delete menu item. Click on Save Button to save menu positions.
This menu will link to Following: Content Page and External Link.
Here you can update your menu.

Drag and drop items to change their positions on the tree. Click on a category or subcategory name to access edit options. Click on icon to delete category item. Click on Save Button to save category positions. Note: Deleting parent category will also delete all children assigned under the same parent
The name of the category will appear in navigation
Choose from dropdown, or leave [Top Level] if this is Top-level category.
Title appearing in browser navigation bar. If left empty will use Category Name instead.
This is the text that appears when the category is viewed. It is optional, but can give an introduction or description of the category
Meta keywords are used to describe your website. These are used by some search engines to categories your website
A meta description is a brief summary of the current page. It may be used by search engines when they display search results containing your website.
Here you can update your category.
Here you can manage your content pages. These page can serve the purpose of privacy policy, F.A.Q., Terms and Condition pages, or anything else you need to let your clients know.
Here you can update your content page.
Here you can add new content page.
Title appearing in browser navigation bar. If left empty will use Page Name instead.
If Yes it will be default homepage menu
If Yes, this page will be your default contact page, with built in contact form
If Yes, this page will be your default F.A.Q. page.
You don't have any content pages yet...

Here you can manage your f.a.q. Once done you can assign all your question and answers under dedicated content page. To reorder items click and drag item reorder handle, position it where you want it. Position will be updated automatically.
Here you can update your f.a.q.
Here you can add new f.a.q. page.
You don't have any content f.a.q. yet...
Here you can manage your news announcements. Note only one news announcement will be visible to front end users at the time.
Here you can update your news item
Here you can add news item page.
You don't have any content news yet...
Here you can manage your countries.
Here you can update your country.
You don't have any Countries yet...
Here you can send newsletter to all users or newsletter subscribers.
All Email(s) have been sent successfully
Some of the emails could not be reached
Below are your email templates. You can modify content of template(s) to suit your needs.
Here you can update your email template
Here you can manage your slider images. To reorder items click and drag item reorder handle, position it where you want it. Position will be updated automatically.
Here you can configure image slider plugin. To reorder items click and drag item reorder handle, position it where you want it. Position will be updated automatically.
Here you can change your slider configuration.
If Yes, the slider will adapt to either the current slide's image height or the current slide's content height, depending on which is tallest
If Yes, slides automatically start timed transitions
If Yes, arrows associated with previous/next slide functions will be shown on hover
If Yes, captions will appear or disappear in time with the slide transition.
If Yes, all captions and descriptions will be displayed.
If Yes, a set of dots that correspond to each slide will be shown on hover.
Enter full url starting with http:// E.g. http://www.mysite.com/somefile.html
File could not be moved from temporary upload folder to image folder.
Default slider height. Will be ignored if Adaptable Height is set to Yes.
Selected file is not valid image. Only jpg and pang
Here you can update your current slide.
Here you can add new slide image.
You don't have any slides yet. Please upload
If Yes, a pause/resume button will be shown on hover.
If Yes, all slides will be displayed in reverse order.
The type of image sizing/positioning for each slide.
If Yes, all slides will be displayed in a random order.
If Yes, a set of thumbnails containing the slides will be shown on hover
If Yes, a timer showing the remaining duration of the current slide will be shown.
The direction in which the slide transitions. Only applicable when Slide Transition is set to 'slide'
The type of easing associated with the slide transition
The type of transition that will occur
The duration each slide is shown, in milliseconds. 1 second = 1000 milliseconds
The speed of the transition, in milliseconds. 1 second = 1000 milliseconds
If Yes, slider will wait for all slides to load before beginning timed transitions.
Here you can manage your discount/coupon codes.
Here you can update your coupon code.
Here you can add new coupon code.
This is the code that will be used to apply discount on total cart amount.
This is your discount amount. Enter numeric values only
Select expire date for this coupon.
Minimum amount required before discount is being calculated. Enter 0 for no minimum amount.
You don't have any coupons news yet...
Here you can view all of your product comments.
Here you can update your comments configuration.
How many comments to show for pagination
Date format used for showing posting time
Is username required to post a comment
Is email required to post a comment
If No, only registered and logged in users can post comments. Otherwise all visitors will be able to post comments freely
Send email notification on each comment added. Will use default site email address
Enter one word per line. Each word will be replaced with ***
You don't have any comments yet...
Here you can manage your products. Note: Deleting active products will also delete all images, comments and all product related items.
Here you can update your product information.
Here you can add new product.
Title appearing in browser navigation bar. If left empty will use Product Name instead.
Enter 0.00 for free downloads or price in 0.00 format
Enter numeric value such as 10. Translates to 10 Days or 10 Downloads, depending of selection.
Image that will accompany your product. Only .jpg and .png files are allowed
Illegal Image type. Only .jpg or .png allowed
If this is audio material, you can upload demo or low quality mp3. Only .mp3 files are allowed
Enter youtube full video link. Format:http://youtu.be/mS0Q%tuyW
Enter live preview url starting with http://
Enter affiliate url starting with http://
Enter product related tags coma separated
You don't have any products yet...
Here you add additional images to your product. Drag and Drop supported on modern browsers.
Be careful what you delete! This image is linked to your project gallery.
This file type is not allowed.
File with the same name already exists.
File is larger than the [LIMIT] limit.
Here you can view all your payment transactions. Note: Deleting valid transaction record will also remove download access to purchased product.
Here you can view your sales report.
Here you can manually assign payment transaction.

Here you can manually update transaction status. In order for download to be valid both Payment Status/Transaction Status must be Completed/Active. You can also reset number of already processed downloads. Reseting to 0 will start counter again unless your product downloads are based on number of days. In this case you will not be able to revert the time.
If checked an email will be sent to notify user of this transaction record
Search txn, username or product name
You don't have any transaction records yet...
There are no sales for selected Year...

Here you can manage your files. Click Browse to select file, enter File Alias and press Upload button. Note: Make sure you are not deleting files that are assigned to an active product!!! Your maximum upload size is [SIZE] If you need to upload files larger than your limit ask your hosting company to increase it

For larger files ftp to your file directory and upload your files there. Once done return here and click on Add All To Database button. All unassigned files will be added to database and available for assignment to your existing or new products.
Are you sure you want to add all files to database
File Alias can not be empty
There was an error renaming file. Selected file does not exist.
You don't have any files yet. Please upload.
You don't have any unassigned files yet.
Here you can view your product latest statistics.
Stay tuned for news and updates
You have successfully registered. Please check your email for further information
You have successfully activated your account!
Your account is now active. However you still need to wait for administrative approval.
Please enter your valid username and password to login into your account.

Enter your username and email address below to reset your password. A verification token will be sent to your email address. Once you have received the token, you will be able to choose a new password for your account
Please fill out the form below to become registered member
Here you can activate your account. Please enter your email address and activation code received.
Here you can update your user info.
Here you can view all your purchased products.
Here you can download all your purchased products.
Here you can view and download generated invoices.
We are sorry, maximum number of registered users have been reached
You currently do not have any products...
You currently do not have any invoices...
We are sorry, at this point we do not accept any more registrations
There was an error during the process. Please contact the administrator.
You have successfully changed your password. Please check your email for further info!
You have successfully updated your profile
There was an error during the activation process. Please contact the administrator.
This account has been already activated!
The product file you requested cannot be found. Please check the spelling of the URL, or return to your account and try again.
This item has expired, and it's no longer available.
Available This item is available for download.
This item is pending an approval.
Sorry, no products available under this category.
Please enter some keywords into search box to perform search.
Sorry, your search for [WORD] did not yield any results. Please try searching for similar terms.
Currently there are not products under tagged name.
Sorry, no products available under this tag.
Entered Website Is Invalid. Must start with http://
Thank you! Your comment have been submitted
Your post have been submitted, and pending verification
Sorry only registered and logged in users can post comments. Please sign in or register.
Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully.
Email could not be sent due to the following error(s):
Here you can finalize your purchase and make the payment. Before proceeding to checkout you need to be registered and logged in.
Sorry your shopping cart is empty!
You must complete your []profile[/] in order to continue with checkout.
Please verify that the information bellow is correct before submitting. Click on continue to select payment method.
Please log into your account to continue. Your cart content will be saved.
File does not exist. Make sure you specified correct file name.
This file type it's not allowed. Make sure you specified correct file extension.
You must be registered and logged in, to download free file.
This item has expired, and it's no longer available, you need to purchase it again.
Illegal access. Your IP: [IP] has been recorded, and administrator has been notified.
Your account has been banned, you are not welcome here. Your IP: [IP] has been recorded, and administrator has been notified.

Looks like the page you're looking for was moved or never existed. Make sure you typed the correct URL or followed a valid link. Use the search above or menu navigation to enter a keyword or phrase to search for content.
